title: Chiropractic Care Center - Chiropractor in Liberty, Missouri
description: The Chiropractic Care Center is your local Chiropractor in Liberty serving all of your needs. Call us today at 816-781-6556 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Einstein reputedly divided people in two groups, those who believe we live in a friendly universe, and those who don't.
